definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

pinyin: liu4 fang1 zui4 mi4 dui1 ji1

sentences.english: In the hexagonal close packed structure, slip systems are more limited .
sentences.chinese: 在六方密排晶格中，滑移系受到較多的限制。

sentences.english: We agreed on the importance of resuming the six-party talks as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 我們一致認爲儘快恢復六方會談是重要的。

sentences.english: There have been no six-party talks with North Korea since 2009.
sentences.chinese: 六方會談自2009年以來一直陷於停頓。

sentences.english: Zhang Zhijun, expressed in the six-party talks, the DPRK put forward their ideas.
sentences.chinese: 張志軍對此表示朝鮮可以在六方會談中提出其主張。

sentences.english: Wu Dawei pointed out that there are various forms of dialogue under the Six-party Talks framework.
sentences.chinese: 武大偉指出，六方會談框架內包括多種對話方式。

sentences.english: Letting deteriorating inter-Korean relations hinder the progress of the six-party talks must be avoided.
sentences.chinese: 一定要避免任由南北關係惡化妨礙六方會談進程。

sentences.english: The nanon size texture is one of intergrowth crystals of cubic and hexagonal diamonds.
sentences.chinese: 這種織構通常是立方和六方金剛石的共生晶體。

sentences.english: Before the February agreement, China was the central player in the six-party nuclear negotiations.
sentences.chinese: 在二月協議之前，中國是六方會談核談判的中心玩家。

sentences.english: Therefore it can be said that all parties have made their contributions to the re-opening of the six party talks.
sentences.chinese: 可以說，各方都爲重啓六方會談做出了自已的貢獻。

sentences.english: Will that affect the Six-Party Talks?
sentences.chinese: 這對於六方會談有何影響？

sentences.english: Has the Chinese side met with them? What kind of expectation does China have for the resumption of the Six-Party Talks?
sentences.chinese: 中方是否會見了雙方代表，對重啓六方會談有何期待？

sentences.english: The parties concerned agreed to hold the Fifth Round of Six-Party Talks in Beijing in early November.
sentences.chinese: 各方商定11月上旬在北京舉行第五輪北京六方會談。

sentences.english: What is China's stance on the resumption of the Six-Party Talks?
sentences.chinese: 中方對重啓六方會談持何立場？

sentences.english: And the representatives of the Six Party Talks use their wisdom to negotiate.
sentences.chinese: 的代表，六方會談用他們的智慧的協商。

sentences.english: The get-together of six parties itself has sent out a positive signal.
sentences.chinese: 六方坐在一起，本身就向世界遞出一個積極信息。

sentences.english: He said the premier, Wen Jiabao, would push for denuclearisation and a return to the six-party talks.
sentences.chinese: 他說，總理溫家寶將推動無核化進程和重啓六方會談。

definition: (Chinese medicine) the seven kinds of prescriptions 大方, 小方, 缓方, 急方, 奇方, 偶方 and 重方 or 复方
the five regions: the east, south, west, north and center/all parts/China and the lands beyond its frontiers
lit. the three legs of a tripod/fig. three competing rivals
the eight points of the compass/all directions
the Eternal Wheel of life in Buddhism
decorated knob protruding from seal, allowing it to be strung on a cord
Karakax County in Hotan Prefecture 和田地區|和田地区[He2 tian2 Di4 qu1], Xinjiang
official seal/imperial or royal seal/papal bull
